CREATING LIST:
[10,]
[10,20,]
[30,10,20,]
[30,10,20,40,]
[50,30,10,20,40,]
[50,30,10,20,40,60,]
[70,50,30,10,20,40,60,]
[70,50,30,10,20,40,60,80,]
[90,70,50,30,10,20,40,60,80,]
[90,70,50,30,10,20,40,60,80,100,]
